targets.query: SELECT mean("Ain") - mean("Aout") FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Ain") - mean("Aout") FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Ah_remain") * mean("V") FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("Ah_remain") * mean("V") FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("V_01") AS "1.01",mean("V_02") AS "1.02",mean("V_03") AS "1.03",mean("V_04") AS "1.04",mean("V_05") AS "1.05",mean("V_06") AS "1.06",mean("V_07") AS "1.07",mean("V_08") AS "1.08",mean("V_09") AS "1.09",mean("V_10") AS "1.10",mean("V_11") AS "1.11",mean("V_12") AS "1.12",mean("V_13") AS "1.13",mean("V_14") AS "1.14",mean("V_15") AS "1.15",mean("V_16") AS "1.16" FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("V_01") AS "2.01",mean("V_02") AS "2.02",mean("V_03") AS "2.03",mean("V_04") AS "2.04",mean("V_05") AS "2.05",mean("V_06") AS "2.06",mean("V_07") AS "2.07",mean("V_08") AS "2.08",mean("V_09") AS "2.09",mean("V_10") AS "2.10",mean("V_11") AS "2.11",mean("V_12") AS "2.12",mean("V_13") AS "2.13",mean("V_14") AS "2.14",mean("V_15") AS "2.15",mean("V_16") AS "2.16" FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(previous)
SELECT abs(mean("Ain")) AS "Ain-1", abs(mean("Aout")) AS "Aout-1" FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(previous)
SELECT abs(mean("Ain")) AS "Ain-2", abs(mean("Aout")) AS "Aout-2" FROM "battery" WHERE ("topic" = 'battery/JKBMS2') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(previous)
